      • isUpToDate

        public static java.lang.Boolean isUpToDate​()
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Checks if the currently installed version is the latest.
        Returns:
        true if it is up to date, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the latest tag name couldn't be retrieved.

      • getLatestTag

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getLatestTag​()
                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Returns:
        the tag of the latest github release
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was an errors while retrieving data

      • getLatestVersionURL

        public static java.lang.String getLatestVersionURL​()
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Retrieves the URL to download the latest version.
        Returns:
        An Optional of the latest version or Optional.empty()
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error querying github

      • compareVersions

        public static CompareResult compareVersions​(java.lang.String versionOne,
                                            java.lang.String versionTwo)
                                     throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                            java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                            java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Compares two version strings to each other.
        Parameters:
        versionOne - first version string
        versionTwo - second version string
        Returns:
        CompareResult.GREATER if argument one is greater, CompareResult.LESS if argument one is less and otherwise CompareResult.EQUAL
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if any of the parameters contains something besides spaces, dots or integral numbers
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the arguments is empty

                                                                          int length)
